metrics.name: Percentage of Hired Candidates
metrics.description: Percentage of job applications that result in a hiring event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
		WHERE event_name IN (${hiring_events}))
	> 0)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of Hired Candidates
metrics.description: Number of job applications that result in a hiring event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
		WHERE event_name IN (${hiring_events}))
	> 0)

metrics.name: Average Time to Hire
metrics.description: Average Time Between Job Application Received and Candidate Hired
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${hiring_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${job_application_creation_events}))))
)

metrics.name: Average Time to Fill
metrics.description: Average Time Between Job Requisition Created and Position Filled
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${hiring_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${job_requisition_creation_events}))))
)

metrics.name: Average Time to Extend Job Offer
metrics.description: Average Time Between Candidate Selected by Hiring Manager and Offer Extended to Candidate
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${offer_extended_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${hiring_manager_hired_events}))))
)

metrics.name: Number of Open Job Requisitions
metrics.description: The number of currently open job requisitions, based on the count of unique Job Requisition IDs and their Job Requisition Status
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT "Job Requisition ID") FILTER (
	WHERE "Job Requisition Status" IN (${job_req_status_open}))

variables.name: hiring_events
variables.description: List of events indicating that the job application resulted in a hire (candidate was hired), e.g. 'Hired'

variables.name: job_application_creation_events
variables.description: List of events indicating that the job application was created, e.g. 'Create Job Application'

variables.name: job_requisition_creation_events
variables.description: List of events indicating that the job requisition was created, e.g. 'Create Job Requisition'

variables.name: hiring_manager_hired_events
variables.description: List of events indicating that the candidate has been selected by the hiring manager, e.g. 'Prepare Offer'

variables.name: offer_extended_events
variables.description: List of events indicating that the job offer has been extended to the candidate, e.g. 'Offer Extended'

variables.name: job_req_status_open
variables.description: List of Job Requisition status entries that indicate a Job Requisition is still open, e.g. 'Open'
